description:
Shana makes it to New York, and meets up with the rest of the Gods of Earth. They agree to help Shana fight, and she then explains the plan to them. Yuji visited Misaki City and found Kazumi Yoshida and Eita Tanaka with Ike and Ogata leaving when Kantaro comes home. Yuji came back to convince Yoshida to join him in building the new universe. While Yoshida, Tanaka, and Yuji walk around town, Yuji explains what he intends to do. After a while of explaining, Yoshida finally agrees to help him.
Source: Wiki
